content: these fingerless gloves feature a decorative lace rib pattern that looks like strings of tiny cables on top of each mitt and a simple ribbing on the palm side for comfort cable needles and cable knitting experience is not necessary because the mock cables are actually created with a basic slipped stitch sequence followed by a yarn over in an easy to memorize five row pattern the overall ribbed pattern is very stretchy and will accomodate most women s hands it can also be easily scaled up by using thicker yarn and needles or by adding a few more stitches in the 2x3 rib bonbons belong to the **box of chocolates** collection of patterns along with the truffle hat and the nougat neckwarmer http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/truffle-4 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/nougat-2 questions or comments about my designs interested in kals & mkals join **susanna ic** group on ravelry http //www ravelry com/groups/susanna-ic 1 http //www knitpicks com/patterns/bonbons-fingerless-mitts html
